write_number.example: Your phone number should be formatted as follows:

info.sms_verification_code_sent: A verification code has been sent to the number: <number></number>. Didn't receive the code? <action>{action}</action>
info.email_verification_code_sent: A verification code has been sent to the email: <email></email>. Didn't receive the code? <action>{action}</action>

redirects.enter_existing_account: Sign in to an existing account

errors.default: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.password_length: The password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.password_character: The password must contain at least one number, one uppercase letter, and one special character
errors.password_not_coincide: The password and confirmation do not match
errors.terms_and_privacy_agreement_required: You must accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
errors.terms_and_privacy_agreement_not_accepted: The Terms of Use or Privacy Policy were not accepted
errors.failed_to_get_browser_agent: Failed to collect a browser agent
errors.failed_to_upload_profile_picture: There was an error uploading the profile picture

info.wait_resend_code_timeout: Wait {seconds} seconds to resend the code.

subtitles.primary: Agility in the transport of agricultural machinery

descriptions.primary: Revolutionizing the way you transport your agricultural machines

agreements.accept_policy_and_terms: I agree to the <use>Terms of Use</use> and acknowledge that I have read the <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>
agreements.terms_of_use_info_1: By accessing or using the website, you agree to comply with the Terms of Use and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.
agreements.terms_of_use_info_2: The materials contained on this site are protected by applicable copyright and trademark laws.
agreements.terms_of_use_info_3: For more information on how we use your data, visit the <link>terms of use</link> page of our platform.
agreements.privacy_policy_info_1: Your privacy is important to us. It is Agrofast's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect on the Agrofast website and other sites we own and operate.
agreements.privacy_policy_info_2: We request personal information only when we truly need it to provide you with a service. We do so by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also inform you why we are collecting it and how it will be used.
agreements.privacy_policy_info_3: For more information on how we use your data, visit the <link>privacy policy</link> page of our platform.
agreements.sign_in_terms: By continuing, we will send a validation code to the provided number. Data and message rates may apply.
agreements.login_terms: By continuing, we will send a validation code to the provided number. Data and message rates may apply.
agreements.mailing_list: I want to receive promotional emails from Agrofast.
